title: Process Timeline
description: An interactive process timeline showing the steps in an instructional design workflow. Click steps to highlight and view details, navigate with Previous/Next buttons.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Education
Instructional Design
Process Visualization
Workflow
learningObjectives: Identify the sequential steps in the instructional design process
Explain the purpose of each phase in the design workflow
Understand the iterative nature of instructional design
Apply the process framework to real-world learning scenarios
prerequisites: Basic understanding of education or training concepts

controls.description: Click on step nodes to select and view details
Previous/Next buttons to navigate through steps

assumptions: Instructional design follows a systematic process
Steps are generally completed in sequence
Iteration and revision are part of the process
limitations: Simplified representation of the ADDIE model
Does not show parallel activities or complex dependencies
Fixed set of steps (not customizable in this version)
